name: Heroes of Time(Singleplayer)
description:
“Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com“

Venture on your own or soon to travel with friends to slay bosses and get the fastest times. The mighty cyclops is no easy foe to defeat with three difficulty levels. Compete with friends to get the fastest time and progress your character as you kill bosses.

This game was made in six weeks at CCM in the Independent Game Studio Course!
